headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Simeon Export Request Bonus: The Sunset Tint Oversize Shades
content: Stay on the lookout for text messages from the ever-present Simeon Yetarian. In addition to the usual monetary dispensation, completing one of his Export Requests by returning a coveted vehicle to his garage will land you the Sunset Tint Oversize Shades as a bonus for being employee of the month (available within 72 hours of logging in after July 15th).
